props.tag: Replaces html with provided value. This is useful for semantics and also to allow for valid markup in some cases (`ul > li` and `tr > td` etc.).

props.autofocus: Focus on first form-component <!-- TODO Add link --> on render

methods.validate: Performs validation and updates error state for each form component. Works with nested forms.
methods.focus: Focus on first focusable form-component in the form.
methods.focusInvalid: Focus on first focusable invalid form-component in the form. This is useful for longer forms and allows to bring user attention to invalid field.
methods.resetValidation: Reset validation for all validateable <!-- TODO Add link --> form-components.
methods.reset: Reset values and validation state for all form-components

props.range: Transforms single value slider into range slider.
props.label: Slider label
props.pins: Adds step marks to a slider track.
props.iconPrepend: Icon at the start of slider.
props.iconAppend: Icon at the end of slider.

slider.title: Slider
slider.paragraph: Slider component is a visualization for number input. User can drag slider within a fixed range to get required value.

basic.subtitle: Basic Element
basic.paragraph: This is basic usage of slider component.

color.headline: Color
color.paragraph: You can customize color of slider.

minmax.headline: Minimum and maximum values
minmax.paragraph: You can set a range between min and max values

state.headline: State
state.paragraph: Slider can be in disabled or readonly state.

range.headline: Range slider
range.paragraph: You can set a range of values.

label.headline: Label
label.paragraph: Label of slider, could have inverted position or custom color.

slots.headline: Slots
slots.paragraph: You can add inputs before and after the slider using 'append' or 'prepend' slot name. Also default label can be replaced using 'label' slot.

icon.headline: Icon
icon.paragraph: You can inser icon at the start or end of slider.

track.headline: Track
track.paragraph: Track color can be hidden or have custom color.

trackLabel.headline: Track label
trackLabel.paragraph: You can show track label and overwrite it's view.

api.subtitle: API
api.paragraph: Here are props, events and slots that are used in va-slider component.
